text: Anthony M. Mandile (August 14, 1946 – January 5, 2002) was an American politician who represented the 10th Middlesex District in the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1987–1993 and again from 1995–1997. He was also a member of the Waltham City Council from 1974–1997. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Politicians from Waltham, Massachusetts Category:Massachusetts Democrats Category:2002 deaths Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives Category:Massachusetts city council members Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Anthony Mandile
